type: Superalgos Review - A vast system without borders

definition.text: Superalgos review by eNut - No borders, all the power for your crypto

paragraphs.text: Superalgos is a vast system to control you assets in a way that only you alone have the keys to you crypto. The visualization of the code makes it more readable and certainly more understandable. This vast piece software base might just be what everybody needs to take control of your assets and learn how to use them.
Fair warning, for non coders it might be a lot to take in, a steep learning curve. The upside: you are only limited by your own imagination.
Like the toturial mentions: your not litarally bending time and space, but it does feel like it.
So I, like everyone should, take a plunge and dive right into:
Assets under your control, no permissions needed.
A vast system, only limited by what you can think of.
An active community with people who know what they are talking about.
I'll try to update this in the future, to let you know how the dive is coming along.
